code: import axios from'axios';var BASE_URL='https://k7c209.p.ssafy.io';export var API_INTRO=axios.create({baseURL:BASE_URL,headers:{}});export var API_AUTH=axios.create({baseURL:BASE_URL,headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.token)}});export var API_FILE=axios.create({baseURL:BASE_URL,headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.token),'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});export var checkType=function checkType(type){switch(type){case 0:return'text';case 1:return'img';case 2:return'video';case 3:return'audio';}};
